text.toplay1: To play the game, touch a word or a hotspot.
text.toplay2: Words are usually color coded as follows:
text.toplay3: To remove a word from the sentence, touch the text display area.
text.toplay4: To submit a sentence, touch the check mark.
text.toplay5: You will receive silver credits for correct responses which will eventually turn to gold and allow you to proceed to the next page.
text.continue: Would you like to continue where you left off?
text.readertext: You collected at least 1 book credit.
text.superreadertext: You collected at least 10 book credits.
